unnormalised: Arre yaar, weather messing with yields again! Remember last year's drought in Rajasthan? Farmers in Vidarbha are facing similar issues. 23/05/2024 heatwave hit bad. Need better irrigation. Maybe ICAR can help? 10 acres gives so less yield now. My kisan credit card Rs. 50k loan isn't enough. Hope monsoon on 15/06 is good. 07:00 hrs prayers for rain!
normalised: Arre yaar, weather messing with yields again! Remember last year's drought in Rajasthan? Farmers in Vidarbha are facing similar issues. twenty third may two thousand and twenty four heatwave hit bad. Need better irrigation. Maybe I C A R can help? ten acres gives so less yield now. My kisan credit card rupee fifty thousand loan isn't enough. Hope monsoon on fifteenth june is good. seven hundred hours prayers for rain!
